channel.title: Giving skillcapes
channel.description: Okay, so I don't like this whole having to buy skillcapes from the typical wise old man, I want to add once the player reaches 99 in a skill, it sends a message to the whole server, and gives that player a trimmed or untrimmed skillcape, does anyone know how I could do this? I'm using PI

item.title: Giving skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @ezzi ezzi
item.description:
@ezzi wrote:

Okay, so I don’t like this whole having to buy skillcapes from the typical wise old man, I want to add once the player reaches 99 in a skill, it sends a message to the whole server, and gives that player a trimmed or untrimmed skillcape, does anyone know how I could do this? I’m using PI
